text: The following lists events that happened in 1931 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Tryggvi Þórhallsson ==Events== ==Births== Oddur Pétursson *1 March - Sveinn Teitsson, footballer *13 April - Halldór Halldórsson, footballer *5 June - Pétur Georgsson, footballer *2 July - Oddur Pétursson, cross country skier. *6 August - Matthías Árni Mathiesen, politician (d. 2011). *27 August - Ebenezer Thorarinsson, cross country skier (d. 2003). *10 September - Magnús Jónsson, footballer *4 October - Jón Helgason, politician. *25 October - Hörður Felixson, footballer *14 December - Hannes Pétursson, poet ===Full date missing=== *Erlendur Haraldsson, psychologist *Jón Gunnar Árnason, sculptor (d. 1989) ==Deaths== ==References== Category:1930s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1931 in Iceland
